p: The obtained (10 mL) aqueous extract was incubated with 1 mM of silver nitrate solution (100 mL) in a volumetric flask in the dark condition at 24 h, as plant extracts containing phenolics are known to be susceptible to photodegradation [ 42]. The synthesis of AgNPs was done at room temperature (25 °C ± 2 °C). The change in the color of the solution after 24 h from light green to brown indicated the reduction of AgNPs.
